full_text:
Page 369
To: @bop.gov>
From: @nbcuni.com>
Subject: Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein
Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 22:56:07 +0000

Just FYI

Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: (NBCUniversal) @nbcuni.com>
Date: August 11, 2019 at 6:53:42 PM EDT
To: "NBCUniversal" @nbcuni.com>
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein

So no further info will be put out tonight? Right? Just need to figure out if I should move  off of it now.
Thanks again!

From: (NBCUniversal)
Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 6:52 PM
To: @NBC Uni Wnbc News Updates <WnbcNewsUpdates@nbcuni.com>
Subject: Fwd: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein

Sent from my iPhone
Begin forwarded message:

From: "OCME" @ocme.nyc.gov>
Date: August 11, 2019 at 6:51:20 PM EDT
To: @ocme.nyc.gov>
Subject: [EXTERNAL] OCME Determination Pending: Jeffrey Epstein

***IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE REMOVED FROM OCME'S PRESS LIST, PLEASE EMAIL @OCME.NYC.GOV WITH THE SUBJECT TITLE: UNSUBSCRIBE***

The Chief Medical Examiner released the below statement today:
"Today, a medical examiner performed the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein. The ME's determination is pending further information at this time. At the request of those representing the decedent, and with the awareness of the federal prosecutor, I allowed a private pathologist  to observe the autopsy examination. This is routine practice.

My office defers to the involved law enforcement agencies regarding other investigations around this death. Inquiries regarding the determination of the Chief Medical Examiner should be directed towards my office."

—
Executive Director for Public Affairs (OCME)
646-210-
212-447-2041
@ocme.nyc.gov

The Chief Medical Examiner released the below statement today:
"Today, a medical examiner performed the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein. The ME's determination is pending further information at this time. My office defers to the involved law enforcement agencies regarding other investigations around this death. Inquiries regarding the determination of the Chief Medical Examiner should be directed towards my office."

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the autopsy of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are heavily redacted, with many names and email addresses obscured.
